nodes.text: Evor Haris was a male individual who served as a peacekeeper on the world Enujut, welcoming all visitors. After Haris allowed a group of Zemerin onto Enujut, they began to create negativity among the world's residents in order to feed off of it. After a protocol droid discovered the truth and informed Haris, the peacekeeper tricked the Zemerin into boarding their starship, and the protocol droid took off to return the Zemerin to their homeworld.
